column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/380440Najib: Gov't observes prudent spendingBernama     27 April 2017The government is observing prudent spending and within limits, and was certainly not extravagant in its expenditure, said Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak.  "We cannot be hasty to spend and be drawn into spending."If we borrow, it must be for productive investment," said Najib, who is also the finance minister.  Speaking at the Finance Ministry's Excellence Service Award ceremony in Putrajaya today, he said the government would ensure the nation's debt level remained below 55 percent.In 2016, Najib said Malaysia's national 's debt level stood at 52.6 percent.- Bernama
LOL.  I love at this title.
Bullshit. Barang 7 juta jadi 14 juta. Prudent like fark
Say what you want, deep inside our hearts we know the answer already.
You wife spending is gamen's spending?
Now must be prudent la, kan dah songlap berjuta left so little to spend.
x tau malus'more in front of finance ministry ppl
Wtf his wife and family use government private jet to goShopping is prudence? Fck off la.
lol prudence so Prime Minister Department and permata can spend more.
gov spent prudent so more money can flow into his pocket
Says the guy that went to Australia with his entire family for vacation.
After 1mdb baru cakap prudent spending. Even govt hospital now cannot afford to replenish vaccine
